Description: Granite anthropoid sarcophagus of Nesisut; incised Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: PM III (2): 290 cf. Zivie-Coche, Giza au premier millenaire (1991): 286.
To be included in the 'Musee achemenide virtuel et interactif' (see www.achemenet.com).
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2005-2006 Oct-Feb, Houston Museum of Natural Sciences, Mummy: The Inside Story 2011-13, Travelling Exhibition, Mummy: The Inside Story 19th Nov 2011- 11 Mar 2012. Richmond , VA, Virginia Museum of Fine Art. Mummy. The inside story.
